title: Object - Plan Security Acceptance
description: An object that represents a plan security acceptance transaction, which is just a compatibility wrapper for an Equity Compensation Acceptance.

object_type.description: This is done to avoid a breaking change as we work towards a bigger restructure of the equity types in v2.0.0. `TX_PLAN_SECURITY_ACCEPTANCE` will be deprecated in v2.0.0
